The enable_logging method of the Bucket object provides a way to enable [http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AmazonS3/2006-03-01/ServerLogs.html Server Access Logging] on an S3 bucket.  This logging provides web server style log files documenting all interactions with the bucket.

==Method Description==

*Name* enable_logging
*Parameters*
  * target_bucket - the bucket to which logging files will be written
  * target_prefix - a prefix for the keys that the delivered log files will be stored under

*Examples*
{{{
>>> b1 = connection.get_bucket('my_public_bucket')
>>> b2 = connection.get_bucket('my_logging_bucket')
>>> b1.enable_logging(b2)
>>>
}}}
